mapper.select: select a.recruit_log_date,b.recruit_title,c.etp_name from recruit_log a INNER JOIN RECRUIT_INFOR b on a.RECRUIT_NO = b.RECRUIT_NO INNER JOIN ETP_INFOR c on b.ETP_NO = c.ETP_NO where member_no = #{member_no}
mapper.insert: insert into recruit_log ( recruit_logno, member_no, recruit_no, recruit_log_date) values (recruit_log_seq.NEXTVAL, #{ member_no },4, sysdate)
